captions.text:
Once I look at you,
I want to see you two more times

When I look at you two and three times,
 I want to hug you more

Wearing the couple ring on my finger,
I want to walk with you

I like you more and more
even though I see you everyday
Even if I pinch my cheek two and three times
I smile as if I'm dreaming
Chu~ I get weak all over
When I see you, I close my eyes
Come to me secretly and kiss me
You're like a dream to me
I can't forget the soft touch
I like you more and more
Chu~ I get weak all over
When I see you, I close my eyes
Come to me secretly and kiss me
You're like a dream to me
Chu~ I get weak all over
When I see you, I close my eyes
Come to me secretly and kiss me
You're like a dream to me
